pageContext.claim: “We've been there for 19 years. We're really serving as policemen. We could win Afghanistan in two days or three days or four days, if we wanted. But I'm not looking to kill 10 million people.”
pageContext.analysis: The U.S. has had a presence in Afghanistan for 18 years. Trump’s suggestion would wipe out one-third of the Afghani population and many experts believe would require nuclear force. Still, there’s no guarantee that such an extreme move would ultimately lead to a stable Afghanistan.
